participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: She's a creative and imaginative girl who prefers playing games over studying.
participant_1.background: i'm a 12 year old girl. i love to play pobox. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i hate school. i do not have many friends.

participant_2.background: i love to bake cookies. i have a dogs. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion.

content.text: Hey! I hate school ? What about you?
